description: This graph represents the Output Generation Engine subsystem, which is responsible for generating various documentation formats, including HTML, MDX, Sphinx (reStructuredText), and plain Markdown. The main flow involves processing analysis results and populating predefined templates to produce comprehensive and interactive documentation outputs. Its purpose is to provide flexible and diverse documentation generation capabilities for code analysis projects.

components.name: HTML Output Generator
components.description: Responsible for generating comprehensive HTML documentation, including interactive visualizations, by processing analysis results and populating predefined HTML templates. This component integrates the functionalities of HTML generation and template rendering.

components.name: MDX Output Generator
components.description: Produces documentation in MDX format, combining Markdown with JSX, designed for modern documentation sites. It incorporates frontmatter for metadata and supports embedding Mermaid diagrams for architectural representations.

components.name: Sphinx Output Generator
components.description: Creates reStructuredText (RST) files, the native format for Sphinx documentation projects. It formats component information, insights, and Mermaid diagrams into RST syntax, ensuring compatibility with Sphinx's build process.

components.name: Markdown Output Generator
components.description: Generates plain Markdown documentation, focusing on creating simple, portable documentation files that can be easily rendered by various Markdown parsers. It includes support for embedding Mermaid diagrams.

components.name: Output Generator Utilities
components.description: Provides common utility functions for the `output_generators` package, including functionalities like naming conventions and data sanitization. These utilities are shared across different output generation processes to ensure consistency and reduce redundancy.
